Posts.Content: If you decide the treatment you are using is no longer tolerable then these people may be able to help. These treatments are non-toxic.  I can't hurt to call them and check out their web sites. They are real doctors who think outside the box.. You can try dr. nicolas gonzalaz http://www.dr-gonzalez.com/index.htm and dr carlos garcia  - http://www.utopiaawaits.com/ also dr joe brown - http://www.drjoebrown.com/   Quote | Reply  Share
